title: Lenovo ThinkPad T14 Gen 3: Release date, price, and everything you need to know
content:
Lenovo’s ThinkPad T14 is the more mainstream of the company’s business laptops, and it’s one of the best ThinkPads in general. As we pointed out in our review of the ThinkPad T14 Gen 2, Lenovo calls it the workhorse of the ThinkPad family, a laptop that nails all the basics without being overly expensive or

The post Lenovo ThinkPad T14 Gen 3: Release date, price, and everything you need to know appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Lenovo's workhorse ThinkPad is getting a significant upgrade with the ThinkPad T14 Gen 3, including a taller screen, and newer processors.
